differences.element_description: The footer section, which originally displayed copyright information and hyperlinks, is replaced with a single block of text promoting AEM.
differences.difference: The overall content of the footer section has changed completely. The original version contains multiple lines of text and hyperlinks, while the translated version contains a single block of promotional text.

styles.background: rgb(248, 248, 248) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box

differences.element_description: The yellow double helix image in the original version.
differences.difference: The yellow double helix image is replaced with a blue gradient double helix image in the translated version, resulting in a completely different visual style.

differences.element_description: The first card in the grid layout.
differences.difference: The order of the cards has changed. 'Unmatched speed' is the first card in the original version, while 'Content at scale' is the first card in the translated version.

differences.element_description: The blue 'Live' button in the original version.
differences.difference: The 'Live' button is missing in the translated version, leaving no interactive element in its place.
The heading font size and line height are significantly reduced in the translated version, making the text less prominent and harder to read.

differences.element_description: The footer section, which originally displayed copyright information and hyperlinks, is replaced with a single block of text promoting AEM.
differences.difference: The overall content of the footer section has changed completely. The original version contains multiple lines of text and hyperlinks, while the translated version contains a single block of promotional text.

differences.element_description: The overall background color of the webpage.
differences.difference: The background color changes from pure white to a slightly off-white shade, creating a subtle visual difference.

differences.element_description: The two-column layout featuring a bulleted list, images, and buttons.
differences.computed_style_change: display: list-item -> display: block; list-style-type: disc -> none
differences.difference: The bulleted list ('One', 'Two', 'Three') is removed in the translated version, replaced by plain text without bullet points.

differences.element_description: The blue 'Live' button in the original version.
differences.difference: The 'Live' button is missing in the translated version, leaving no interactive element in its place.

differences.element_description: The yellow double helix image in the original version.
differences.difference: The yellow double helix image is replaced with a blue gradient double helix image in the translated version, resulting in a completely different visual style.

differences.element_description: The grid layout of cards titled 'Boilerplate Highlights?'.
differences.difference: The grid layout changes from a block layout to a grid layout in the translated version, with smaller text and rearranged card order. The translated version appears more compact and less visually balanced.
The heading font size and line height are significantly reduced in the translated version, making the text less prominent and harder to read.
